collection.name: source_save_data
collection.code:
if(!is.list(new_data) || length(new_data) != length(names(new_data))) {
  stop("new_data parameter must be of type 'list' and contain key=value pairs as its elements!")
}

db = fromJSON(data_bank)

table = "default_data_table"
session_id_column = "session_id"
name_column = "name"
value_column = "value"
data_set_id_column = "data_set_id"
if(db$table_type == "custom") {
  table = db$custom_table$table
  session_id_column = db$custom_table$columns$session_id
  name_column = db$custom_table$columns$name
  value_column = db$custom_table$columns$value
  data_set_id_column = db$custom_table$columns$data_set_id
}

session_id = 0
if(!is.null(session) && is.list(session)) {
  session_id = session$id
} else {
  session_id = paste0("i",concerto$session$id)
}

for(name in ls(new_data)) {
  record = concerto.table.query("SELECT * FROM {{table}} WHERE {{session_id_column}} = '{{session_id}}' AND {{name_column}} = '{{name}}' AND {{data_set_id_column}}='{{data_set_id}}'", list(
    table=table, 
    session_id_column=session_id_column, 
    session_id=session_id, 
    name_column=name_column, 
    name=name,
    data_set_id_column=data_set_id_column,
    data_set_id=dbEscapeStrings(concerto$connection, toString(db$data_set_id))
  ))
  if(dim(record)[1] > 0) { 
    concerto.table.query("UPDATE {{table}} SET {{value_column}} = '{{value}}' WHERE {{session_id_column}} = '{{session_id}}' AND {{name_column}} = '{{name}}' AND {{data_set_id_column}}='{{data_set_id}}'", list(
      table=table, 
      value_column=value_column, 
      value=new_data[[name]], 
      session_id_column=session_id_column, 
      session_id=session_id, 
      name_column=name_column, 
      name=name,
      data_set_id_column=data_set_id_column,
      data_set_id=dbEscapeStrings(concerto$connection, toString(db$data_set_id))
    ))
  } else {
    concerto.table.query("INSERT INTO {{table}} ({{value_column}}, {{session_id_column}}, {{name_column}}, {{data_set_id_column}}) VALUES ('{{value}}', '{{session_id}}', '{{name}}', '{{data_set_id}}')", list(
      table=table, 
      value_column=value_column, 
      value=new_data[[name]], 
      session_id_column=session_id_column, 
      session_id=session_id, 
      name_column=name_column, 
      name=name,
      data_set_id_column=data_set_id_column,
      data_set_id=dbEscapeStrings(concerto$connection, toString(db$data_set_id))
    ))
  }
}

params.label: Data bank
params.description:
Define data bank:

  • default - uses default data table
  • custom - define your own data table
params.name: data_bank

collection.name: save_data

table = "default_data_table"
session_id_column = "session_id"
name_column = "name"

data_set_id_column = "data_set_id"

}

for(name in ls(new_data)) {

    data_set_id=dbEscapeStrings(concerto$connection, toString(db$data_set_id))

  if(dim(record)[1] > 0) {

      table=table, 
      value_column=value_column, 
      value=new_data[[name]], 
      session_id_column=session_id_column, 
      session_id=session_id, 
      name_column=name_column,

      data_set_id=dbEscapeStrings(concerto$connection, toString(db$data_set_id))

  } else {

      table=table,
